attributes.title: Episode 1: Auditions
attributes.description: Gamers trek down to the Rooster Teeth Studios to audition for a spot in the new gaming series: The Gauntlet.

attributes.title: Episode 2: The Draft
attributes.description: The contestants meet each other for the first time and get introduced to the Rooster Teeth staff, but all is not exactly as it appears...

attributes.title: Episode 3: Team Fortress 2 and Call of Duty Black Ops
attributes.description: Four teams face off against one another with two of the most popular first person shooting games ever. Who will go home Watch this week's episode of The Gauntlet.
attributes.display_title: Episode 3: Team Fortress 2 and Call of Duty Black Ops

attributes.title: Episode 4: The Concert
attributes.caption: The Concert
attributes.description: The 3 teams square off on stage and rock out in Rock Band and the losers face a special guest in this week's episode of The Gauntlet

attributes.title: Episode 5: Halo - Combat Evolved
attributes.caption: Halo: Combat Evolved
attributes.description: Teams Red and Yellow square off in a classic game of Capture the Flag in good ole Blood Gulch.

attributes.title: Episode 6: Super Mario Bros.
attributes.caption: Super Mario Bros.
attributes.description: Team Gus and Team Brook head to the state for a Mario Bros. Generational relay!

attributes.title: Episode 7: Zombie Day
attributes.caption: Zombie Day
attributes.description: Team Gus and Brooke come back from the dead and square off in one of the most popular Zombie games in existence!

attributes.title: Episode 8: Minecraft
attributes.caption: Minecraft
attributes.description: It's every man for himself in a dark and dangerous Minecraft Crypt!

attributes.title: Episode 10: The Finale
attributes.caption: The Finale
attributes.description: It all comes down to one final episode to determine the winner of the $10,000 grand prize.
